MetricDescription: % systems that impose restrictions on system maintenance personnel
Target:
X % or higher, 
X % higher than previous period, 
X % increase over a defined period 

Higher is better, ideally 100%
Comment: Refer the document for more guidance on this
Source: NIST (Archived): SP 800-55, Security Metrics Guide for Information Technology Systems

MetricDescription: % software changes documented and approved through change request forms
Source: NIST (Archived): SP 800-55, Security Metrics Guide for Information Technology Systems

MetricDescription: % systems with the latest approved patches installed
Target:
X % or higher, 
X % higher than previous period, 
X % increase over a defined period 

Higher is better, ideally 100%
Source: NIST (Archived): SP 800-55, Security Metrics Guide for Information Technology Systems
